imdb.plot outline: From Woonsocket to Westerly, Brian Harnois (Ghost Hunters and Ghost Hunters International), Jason Mayoh, Christian White, and a team of investigators take their cameras, meters, and recorders to some well-known legendary and some off-beat, little-known sites of reported paranormal activity in Rhode Island. Hear the stories from historians, folklorians, and eye witnesses. Follow the team on the investigations (at night, of course). See the evidence, pictures, and historical records as they find and comb through them. Think of it as history meets mystery... the historical joins the hysterical. However you choose to see it (and you will see it), it's fun, surprising, informative - and exclusively on WSBE Rhode Island PBS. See for yourself. You know you want to look...
imdb.title: Haunted RI
plot: A team of investigators take their cameras, meters, and recorders to some little-known sites of reported paranormal activity in Rhode Island.::Brian Harnois

From Woonsocket to Westerly, Brian Harnois (Ghost Hunters and Ghost Hunters International), Jason Mayoh, Christian White, and a team of investigators take their cameras, meters, and recorders to some well-known legendary and some off-beat, little-known sites of reported paranormal activity in Rhode Island. Hear the stories from historians, folklorians, and eye witnesses. Follow the team on the investigations (at night, of course). See the evidence, pictures, and historical records as they find and comb through them. Think of it as history meets mystery... the historical joins the hysterical. However you choose to see it (and you will see it), it's fun, surprising, informative - and exclusively on WSBE Rhode Island PBS. See for yourself. You know you want to look...::Brian Harnois
